text: Joshua Aaron Charles (born September 15, 1971) is an American actor. He is best known for his roles as Dan Rydell on the television series Sports Night and Will Gardner on the CBS legal drama television series The Good Wife. == Other websites == * Category:1971 births Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Jewish American actors Category:Actors from Baltimore Category:Living people
title: Josh Charles
